{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C5400 |revision=v2.x‎ |series=AC5400 |asin=B01DXVK3KY |newegg=N82E16833704302 |fcc_date=10/24/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C5400V2, TE7C5400 |ic_id=8853A-C5400V2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG, UT1519 P10, 503757-08 Z1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81MA-25T |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q128FVFG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1524 P21, 514980-03 3 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1524 P21, 514980-03 3 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1524 P21, 514980-03 3 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 501FH;4; ,,, 5GHz Powew Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;SKY85405, 511FE, 1511 MY;8; ,,, 2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;ASM1182e, BKT78701A1, 1343;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, Link Aggregation, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G_1, TP-Link_XXXX_5G_2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• 2x '''2167Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024-QAM), :• 1x '''1000Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024-QAM) = '''''5400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC5400 Wireless Tri-Band MU-MIMO Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C5400.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C5400}} FCC ID TE7C5400V2 is a change in ID from TE7C5400 which is supposedly electrically identical. DFS Support was added with a Class II Permissive Change with the FCC on 4/26/2018. Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/C5400_emulator/index.html Web GUI Emulator]
